hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of Abu Huraira that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) observed:He who took up arms against us is not of us and he who acted dishonestly towards us is not of us

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ - صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم - " مَنْ غَشَّنَا فَلَيْسَ مِنَّا "
chapter.eng-name: The Saying of the prophet (ﷺ): "Whoever deceives us is not one of us."
